title: Stock Futures Point to Gains Ahead of Fed Chairman Decision
sub_head: Investors await housing data and earnings from Zoom; Telecom Italia shares leap after KKR bids to take company private
body:
U.S. stocks headed for opening gains as investors awaited data on the property market and a decision on the next Federal Reserve chairman.
Futures for the S&P 500 rose 0.3% Monday, after the benchmark index closed last week at its fourth-highest level on record. Contracts for the Dow Jones Industrial Average also edged up 0.3% and futures for the technology-focused Nasdaq-100 rose 0.4%.
